pr_title: Update otel api instrumentation module name

timeline.message: Update otel api instrumentation module name

timeline.bodyText: Is it correct package name, vbeta?
timeline.author: iNikem

replies.bodyText:
it's a placeholder for v1_0
though our convention is not to have a vX_Y package until there are more than one version supported, so i have removed 👍
replies.author: trask

timeline.bodyText: We did not have version here, why should we now?
timeline.author: iNikem

replies.bodyText:
this one i think we should keep, because (at least the way it currently works) we will need one
opentelemetry-api-X.Y-shaded-for-instrumenting
module for each
opentelemetry-api-X.Y
instrumentation module.
replies.author: trask
